pages.title: Subscribe to the shows you like
pages.text: Use the bell icon to receive show notifications.

pages.title: Receive notifications
pages.text: You will be notified when a new episode is available.

pages.title: Manage your subscriptions
pages.text: Add or cancel subscriptions at any time.

pages.title: Resume playback
pages.text: When reopening a content previously watched, playback resumes where you left off.

pages.title: Account
pages.text: Open an account to enable more features.

pages.title: Synchronize playback
pages.text: With an account you can resume playback on another device.
